wf_workflow_version.name: Research Screening
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: non_med_revisions=true^ORnon_med_revisions_nursing=true^EQ
non_med_revisions=true^ORnon_med_revisions_nursing=true^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
clinical_greenlight=true^ORnon_med_revisions=true^EQ
clinical_greenlight=true^ORnon_med_revisions=true^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
clinical_nursing_greenlight=true^ORnon_med_revisions_nursing=true^EQ
clinical_nursing_greenlight=true^ORnon_med_revisions_nursing=true^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

wf_activity.name: Remove retrigger flag and close tasks

activity.display_value: Remove retrigger flag and close tasks

wf_activity.name: Second validation already done already done?

activity.display_value: Second validation already done already done?
Second validation already done already done?

sys_variable_value.value: current.clinical_greenlight = true; current.clinical_nursing_greenlight = true;
current.clinical_greenlight = true; current.clinical_nursing_greenlight = true;
pre_build_complete=true^x_sthc_human_resou_pre_build_complete=true^EQ
pre_build_complete=true^x_sthc_human_resou_pre_build_complete=true^EQ
clinical_greenlight=true^clinical_nursing_greenlight=true^medication_nursing_greenlight=true^medication_pharmacy_greenlight=true^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
clinical_greenlight=true^clinical_nursing_greenlight=true^medication_nursing_greenlight=true^medication_pharmacy_greenlight=true^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

wf_activity.name: Wait for all tasks to close

activity.display_value: Wait for all tasks to close

sys_variable_value.value: non_med_build_complete=true^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
non_med_build_complete=true^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
u_has_this_request_been_retriggered=true^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
u_has_this_request_been_retriggered=true^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
